message: Let's split it 90/10, I think it's a fair start. We can negotiate further if you don't agree.
Let's be more balanced. I propose a 60/40 split, giving you a good starting point. We can adjust if you prefer.
Let's get closer to a fair split. I'm willing to go down to 65/35, but I'm not going any lower. This is a good deal for both of us, especially with the inflation factor.
